data.title: Music & Memories Sunday, May 5, 2024
meta_keywords: funeral home in Sauk Centre MN
data.meta_description: Welcome to our website. We provide individualized funeral services designed to meet the needs of each family. Our staff of dedicated professionals is available to assist you in making funeral service arrangements. From casket choices to funeral flowers, we will guide you through all aspects of the funeral service.
data.text:
Music & Memories

Broadcast for Sunday May 5, 2024

Covering the deaths from May 5-11, 2024

Good morning and welcome to Music & Memories.

This is Linda Sue, and I am the grief specialist at Patton-Schad Funeral Home. It is my pleasure to bring you this week’s program on KASM. This program is our way of reaching out to help families deal with those difficult days surrounding the death anniversary of a loved one.

As April showers bring May flowers, nature once again reminds us of Hope in the days ahead. Our grief is no different, looking ahead to better days. As we move forward on our journey it's important to remember we are not leaving your loved one behind. They are right there with us in our heart all the way. It is up to us to keep their memory and legacy alive by the telling of the stories and sharing those precious memories. The much-needed rain is cleansing the earth as tears cleanse our spirit and soul, love tears. The flowing of tears is a reminder of our love and is very healthy to our soul! Don't be ashamed of the tears but rather welcome and celebrate them!!

This program is dedicated to the memory of:

Julius “Joe” Wegleitner who died May 5, 2023

June (Duclos) Domine who died May 5, 2023

Rose Renneker who died May 5, 2002

Albert Yarke Sr. who died May 5, 1990

Anna Slivnik who died May 5, 1989

Lucille Harms who died May 6, 2022

John Wolbeck who died May 7, 1993

Wilfred “Willy” Ring who died May 7, 1987

Juletta Kunstleben-Wolbeck who died May 8, 2001

Leona May who died May 8, 2018

We encourage you as family and friends to show that you care by remembering these families, this week, with a phone call, a card, or a visit.
